# Mapleon - Codebase Index & Documentation

## ğŸ“‹ Project Overview

**Project Name:** Mapleon  
**Type:** Frontend-only Single Page Application (SPA)  
**Purpose:** Location-based social discovery platform for local businesses  
**Tech Stack:** React 18 + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind CSS  
**Generated By:** Magic Patterns  

---

## ğŸ—ï¸ Architecture

### Application Type
- **Frontend Framework:** React 18.3.1 with TypeScript
- **Build Tool:** Vite 5.2.0
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS 3.4.17
- **Router:** React Router DOM 6.26.2
- **Maps:** React Leaflet 4.2.1
- **Icons:** Lucide React 0.522.0
- **Deployment:** Firebase Hosting

### Data Layer
- **No Backend:** This is a frontend-only application
- **No Database:** All data is mocked in `/app/src/utils/mockData.ts`
- **Mock Data Types:** Businesses, Posts, Messages, Categories

---

## ğŸ¨ Design System

### Color Palette (Mapleon Theme)
```javascript
colors: {
  mapleon: {
    coral: '#FF7A57',      // Primary brand color
    pink: '#FF4D7A',       // Secondary accent
    magenta: '#F53DFF',    // Accent
    purple: '#A54DFF',     // Accent
    teal: '#1DA9A1',       // Primary action
    aqua: '#146C78',       // Secondary action
    slate: '#0D1A20',      // Text/dark
    gray: '#E7ECEF',       // Background
    'teal-tint': '#CCE7E5', // Light accent
    success: '#3BE5A9',    // Success state
    warning: '#FFB84D',    // Warning state
    error: '#FF5E5E',      // Error state
  }
}
```

### Gradients
- `mapleon-gradient`: Main brand gradient (coral â†’ pink â†’ magenta â†’ purple â†’ teal)
- `mapleon-gradient-soft`: Soft version with opacity
- `glass`: Glass-morphism gradient

### Typography
- **Font Family:** Inter (Google Fonts)
- **Weights:** 300, 400, 500, 600, 700, 800

### Animations
- `pulse-glow`: 2s ease-in-out infinite
- `float`: 3s ease-in-out infinite
- `slide-up`: 0.3s ease-out

---

## ğŸ§© Core Components

### Navigation Components
1. **BottomNav** (`/src/components/BottomNav.tsx`)
   - Fixed bottom navigation bar
   - 5 tabs: Home, Near Me, Bookings, Messages, Profile
   - Dynamic styling based on current route
   - Dark/light mode support

### Display Components
2. **FeedPost** (`/src/components/FeedPost.tsx`)
   - TikTok-style vertical scrolling post
   - Full-screen image/video display
   - Like, comment, share actions
   - Business information overlay
   - Booking CTA button
   - Collapsible captions

3. **BusinessCard** (`/src/components/BusinessCard.tsx`)
   - Compact business information card
   - Rating, distance, category
   - View details and directions buttons
   - Used in map view and search results

4. **Button** (`/src/components/Button.tsx`)
   - Reusable button component
   - Variants: primary, secondary, ghost, white, dark
   - Sizes: sm, md, lg
   - Full-width option

### Modal Components
5. **CommentsModal** (`/src/components/CommentsModal.tsx`)
   - Full-screen comments overlay
   - Comment threading/replies
   - Like comments functionality
   - Add new comments

6. **ShareSheet** (`/src/components/ShareSheet.tsx`)
   - Bottom sheet for sharing
   - Social media sharing options
   - Copy link, save post, report
   - Native share API integration

---

## ğŸ“„ Pages Overview

### User Flow Pages
1. **Onboarding** (`/`)
   - App splash screen with logo
   - Location permission request
   - Animated radar effect

2. **InterestSelection** (`/interests`)
   - Category selection (restaurants, gyms, salons, etc.)
   - Multi-select interface
   - Personalization step

3. **HomeFeed** (`/home`)
   - Main TikTok-style feed
   - Vertical scrolling posts
   - Snap-to-section behavior
   - Full-screen immersive experience
   - Notification bell with badge

### Discovery Pages
4. **Explore** (`/explore`)
   - Trending items carousel
   - Category filters
   - Discovery grid
   - Search functionality
   - Camera search feature

5. **MapView** (`/map`)
   - Interactive Leaflet map
   - Business markers by category
   - Category filter pills
   - "Near Me" location button
   - Business card preview on marker click
   - Search on map
   - Navigation to business locations

6. **SearchResults** (`/search`)
   - Search results display
   - Filter and sort options

### Business Pages
7. **BusinessDetail** (`/business/:id`)
   - Image carousel
   - Business information
   - Ratings and reviews
   - Tabs: Info, Photos/Videos, Reviews
   - Book a table CTA
   - Call now button
   - Mini map preview
   - Share functionality

8. **Bookings** (`/bookings`)
   - Business selection
   - Date picker
   - Party size selector
   - Time slot selection
   - Booking summary
   - Confirmation modal

### Social Pages
9. **Profile** (`/profile`)
   - User profile information
   - Cover and profile images
   - Stats (posts, followers, following)
   - Interests and achievements
   - Posts/Liked/Saved tabs
   - Photo grid
   - Edit profile modal
   - Share profile

10. **Messages** (`/messages`)
    - Conversation list
    - Unread message badges
    - Navigate to individual chats

11. **ChatView** (`/chat`)
    - Individual conversation view
    - Message threading
    - (Implementation details TBD)

12. **Notifications** (`/notifications`)
    - Notification center
    - (Implementation details TBD)

13. **Favorites** (`/favorites`)
    - Saved/bookmarked businesses
    - (Implementation details TBD)

### Settings & Info Pages
14. **Settings** (`/settings`)
    - Profile editing
    - Notification toggles
    - Location services toggle
    - Privacy settings
    - Help center link
    - Terms and privacy links
    - Logout functionality

15. **Help** (`/help`)
    - Help center
    - (Implementation details TBD)

16. **PrivacyPolicy** (`/privacy`)
    - Privacy policy content
    - (Implementation details TBD)

17. **TermsOfService** (`/terms`)
    - Terms of service content
    - (Implementation details TBD)

## ğŸ“Š Data Models

### Business Interface
```typescript
interface Business {
  id: string;
  name: string;
  category: 'restaurant' | 'gym' | 'salon' | 'cafe' | 'service';
  image: string;
  description: string;
  rating: number;
  reviews: number;
  distance: number;
  openNow: boolean;
  location: {
    lat: number;
    lng: number;
  };
  profileImage?: string;
}
```

### Post Interface
```typescript
interface Post {
  id: string;
  businessId: string;
  businessName: string;
  businessCategory: string;
  image: string;
  caption: string;
  likes: number;
  comments: number;
  shares: number;
  distance: number;
  trending?: boolean;
  profileImage: string;
  username: string;
}
```

### Message Interface
```typescript
interface Message {
  id: string;
  businessName: string;
  businessCategory: string;
  message: string;
  timestamp: string;
  unread: number;
  profileImage: string;
}
```

### Categories
```typescript
const categories = [
  { id: 'restaurant', name: 'Restaurants', icon: 'UtensilsCrossed', color: '#FF7A57' },
  { id: 'gym', name: 'Gyms', icon: 'Dumbbell', color: '#1DA9A1' },
  { id: 'salon', name: 'Salons', icon: 'Scissors', color: '#A54DFF' },
  { id: 'cafe', name: 'Coffee', icon: 'Coffee', color: '#FF4D7A' },
  { id: 'service', name: 'More', icon: 'Sparkles', color: '#3BE5A9' }
];
```

---

## ğŸ¯ Key Features

### 1. TikTok-Style Feed
- **Location:** `/home` (HomeFeed.tsx)
- Vertical scrolling with snap behavior
- Full-screen posts
- Like, comment, share actions
- Directions navigation
- Book a table CTA
- Collapsible captions

### 2. Interactive Map
- **Location:** `/map` (MapView.tsx)
- Leaflet integration
- Custom category markers
- User location marker
- Category filters
- Business previews on click
- Search functionality
- "Near Me" button

### 3. Booking System
- **Location:** `/bookings` (Bookings.tsx)
- Business selection with cards
- Date picker
- Party size (1-8 people)
- Time slot grid (11 AM - 9:30 PM)
- Booking summary
- Confirmation modal

### 4. Social Features
- User profiles with posts
- Follow/follower system (UI only)
- Like and comment on posts
- Share posts to social media
- Direct messaging
- Notifications
- Achievements/badges

### 5. Business Discovery
- Explore trending businesses
- Category-based filtering
- Search functionality
- Camera search (coming soon)
- Distance-based sorting
- Ratings and reviews

---

## ğŸ”§ Configuration Files

### Vite Config (`vite.config.ts`)
```typescript
server: {
  host: '0.0.0.0',
  port: 3000,
  strictPort: true,
  allowedHosts: [
    'dinetime-preview.preview.emergentagent.com',
    '.preview.emergentagent.com',
    'localhost'
  ]
}
```

### TypeScript Config (`tsconfig.json`)
- Target: ES2020
- JSX: react-jsx
- Strict mode enabled
- Module: ESNext
- Module resolution: bundler

### Tailwind Config (`tailwind.config.js`)
- Custom Mapleon color palette
- Gradient backgrounds
- Custom shadows (glow, neumorphic)
- Custom animations
- Extended utilities

## ğŸ¨ UI/UX Features

### Design Patterns
1. **Glass-morphism:** Backdrop blur with semi-transparent backgrounds
2. **Neumorphism:** Soft shadows for cards
3. **Gradients:** Vibrant brand gradients throughout
4. **Snap Scrolling:** Smooth section-to-section navigation
5. **Active States:** Scale animations on tap/click
6. **Mobile-First:** Optimized for mobile devices

### Responsive Design
- Mobile-first approach
- `sm:` breakpoint for larger screens
- Flexible layouts with Tailwind utilities
- Touch-friendly tap targets

### Accessibility Features
- Semantic HTML
- ARIA labels (should be added)
- Keyboard navigation support
- High contrast ratios
- Focus states

---

```
/ â†’ Onboarding
/interests â†’ InterestSelection
/home â†’ HomeFeed (main feed)
/explore â†’ Explore (discovery)
/map â†’ MapView (interactive map)
/bookings â†’ Bookings
/messages â†’ Messages
/chat â†’ ChatView
/profile â†’ Profile
/settings â†’ Settings
/business/:id â†’ BusinessDetail
/notifications â†’ Notifications
/favorites â†’ Favorites
/search â†’ SearchResults
/help â†’ Help
/privacy â†’ PrivacyPolicy
/terms â†’ TermsOfService
```

## ğŸ” Search & Discovery

### Search Features (Explore Page)
- Text search with search bar
- Category filtering
- Camera search (UI ready, feature TBD)
- Trending items carousel
- Discovery grid

### Map Search (Map Page)
- Search on map functionality
- Category-based filtering
- Distance-based results
- Real-time marker updates

---

## ğŸ’¾ State Management

### Current Approach
- **Local Component State:** React useState hooks
- **No Global State:** Each component manages its own state
- **Props Drilling:** Parent-to-child data passing
- **URL State:** Router location state for navigation

### Potential Improvements
- Context API for user data
- Redux/Zustand for global state
- React Query for data fetching (when backend added)

---

## ğŸ” Features Pending Implementation

### Completed (UI Only)
- User authentication (no backend)
- Real data fetching (using mock data)
- Image uploads (simulated)
- Payment processing
- Push notifications
- Real-time messaging
- Geolocation integration (alerts only)

### Pages with Placeholders
- ChatView (basic structure)
- Notifications (basic structure)
- Favorites (basic structure)
- SearchResults (basic structure)
- Help (basic structure)
- PrivacyPolicy (basic structure)
- TermsOfService (basic structure)

---

## ğŸŒ External Integrations

### Current
- **Unsplash:** All images sourced from Unsplash
- **Google Fonts:** Inter font family
- **OpenStreetMap:** Map tiles via Leaflet

### Potential Future Integrations
- Firebase Authentication
- Firebase Firestore (database)
- Stripe/PayPal (payments)
- Twilio/SendGrid (notifications)
- Google Maps API (alternative to Leaflet)
- Social media APIs (sharing)

---

## ğŸ“ Code Style & Conventions

### TypeScript
- Strict mode enabled
- Interface definitions for all data types
- Type annotations for function parameters
- Explicit return types for complex functions

### React Patterns
- Functional components only
- React Hooks (useState, useEffect, useRef, etc.)
- Custom hooks (potential improvement)
- Props interfaces for all components

### CSS/Styling
- Tailwind utility classes
- Custom utilities in `@layer utilities`
- No CSS modules
- Minimal custom CSS in index.css

### File Naming
- PascalCase for components: `BusinessCard.tsx`
- camelCase for utilities: `mockData.ts`
- kebab-case for config files: `vite.config.ts`

---

## ğŸ› Known Issues / TODOs

1. **No Backend:** All data is mocked
2. **No Authentication:** User system is UI-only
3. **Camera Search:** Feature announced but not implemented
4. **Real Geolocation:** Only alerts, no actual location services
5. **Image Uploads:** Simulated with random selection
6. **Messaging:** Basic UI, no real-time functionality
7. **Notifications:** UI exists but no notification system
8. **Payment Processing:** Booking confirmation but no payment
9. **Empty Pages:** Several pages need content (Help, Privacy, Terms, etc.)
10. **Accessibility:** Need ARIA labels and keyboard navigation improvements

---

## ğŸ¯ Suggested Next Steps

### High Priority
1. **Backend Integration:** Add API endpoints for real data
2. **Authentication:** Implement Firebase Auth or similar
3. **Database:** Set up Firestore or MongoDB
4. **Real-time Messaging:** Socket.io or Firebase Realtime Database
5. **Geolocation:** Actual location services integration

### Medium Priority
6. **Search Implementation:** Backend search functionality
7. **Favorites System:** Persistent saved businesses
8. **Notifications:** Push notification service
9. **Payment Integration:** Stripe for bookings
10. **Image Uploads:** Cloud storage integration

### Low Priority
11. **Analytics:** User behavior tracking
12. **Performance Optimization:** Code splitting, lazy loading
13. **Testing:** Unit tests, integration tests, E2E tests
14. **Accessibility Audit:** WCAG compliance
15. **SEO Optimization:** Meta tags, SSR consideration

---

## ğŸ¤ Contributing Guidelines

### Development Workflow
1. Fork the repository
2. Create a feature branch
3. Make your changes
4. Test thoroughly
5. Submit a pull request

### Code Standards
- Follow existing TypeScript conventions
- Use Tailwind classes for styling
- Write descriptive component names
- Add comments for complex logic
- Keep components small and focused

## Quick Reference Card

### Start Development
```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```

### Project Highlights
- **Framework:** React + TypeScript + Vite
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS with custom Mapleon theme
- **Routing:** React Router DOM (17 routes)
- **Components:** 23 page components + 9 reusable components
- **Data:** Mock data in `/src/utils/mockData.ts`
- **No Backend:** Frontend-only application

### Key Files
- Entry: `/src/index.tsx`
- Router: `/src/App.tsx`
- Data: `/src/utils/mockData.ts`
- Styles: `/src/index.css`
- Config: `vite.config.ts`, `tailwind.config.js`

---

*End of Codebase Index*
